title: Ahmed Abdelbaset Badir
content: Objective: Seeking a position as an Aluminum Fabrication Foreman or Assistant supervisor, where I can apply my technical expertise and leadership skills in manufacturing kitchens, doors, windows, and curtain wall systems. Dedicated to ensuring high-quality production, efficient workflow, and smooth coordination across all project stages. Education: Technical Commercial Institute – Tanta - Egypt Diploma in Commercial Studies (2010–2012) El-Shaheed Hilal Secondary School- Kafr El-Sheikh - Egypt General Secondary Certificate — 2008 Experience: ALU System Company — Riyadh, Saudi Arabia 2023 – 2025 Worked as the Foreman in charge of aluminum curtain wall and mashrabiya fabrication at the STC Smart Site Worked as Fabrication Technician on the following projects: Riyadh Specialized Hospital – Riyadh, Y7 Project, Dr. Soliman Fakih Hospital, Madinah Gate, Kingdom Gate, Novotel Hotel, Al Inma Bank, Red Sea Project (Curtain Wall), Sindalah Island, Dar Al Hijra, Misk Project, Amala Island Materials & Systems Used: Unities (Curtain Wall & Aluminum Systems), Alupco, Technal, Gutmann, Alumile, Cladding Project Supervisor — Al Massa - Al, Riyadh 2022 – 2023 Supervised aluminum and curtain wall installations. Worked on : Taya Center Al Bilad Bank – Al Hamra District Al Bilad Bank – Hafar Al-Batin Al Riyad Bank – Al Rabee District Aluminum Technician — Ajwad Company, Riyadh 2020 – 2022 Fabrication and installation of kitchens, windows, and doors. Worked on: Riyadh Metro Al Bathaa Curtain Wall Project National Guard (Kitchens & Windows) Aluminum Technician — Zamzam Company, Kafr El-Sheikh 2017 – 2020 Fabrication of all aluminum types: kitchens, windows, doors, curtain walls. Performed maintenance and execution duties. Aluminum Technician — Al Nokhba Establishment, Al-Qassim 2015 – 2017 Worked on various fabrication and installation projects across Qassim. Aluminum Technician — Zamzam Company, Kafr El-Sheikh 2015 – 2015 Fabrication of all aluminum types: kitchens, windows, doors, curtain walls. Performed maintenance and execution duties. Aluminum Technician — Quality Company, Sirte, Libya 2012 – 2015 Manufacturing kitchens, doors, and windows. Skills Strong fabrication and assembly skills Aluminum systems (Curtain Wall, Kitchens, Doors, Windows) Team Leader & workflow management Quality control and project execution Measurements, cutting, and installation expertise
